what: NBDCtoolsData: NBDC Data Hub Tools (Data Package)
title: NBDCtoolsData: NBDC Data Hub Tools (Data Package)
text: repository data package contains metadata required run functions NBDCtools package.

title: NBDCtoolsData: NBDC Data Hub Tools (Data Package)
text: install NBDCtoolsData, use following command: install specific release package, specify tag install_github() call. example, install 1.0.0 branch, use:

title: NBDCtoolsData: NBDC Data Hub Tools (Data Package)
text: general overview use data package, see NBDCtools main documentation.

title: NBDCtoolsData: NBDC Data Hub Tools (Data Package)
text: encounter issues using package, please report submitting GitHub issue.

title: List of data dictionaries — lst_dds
text: list data dictionaries NBDC Data Hub studies. First level list study name (currently ABCD & HBCD), second level version/release study.
code: - lst_dds     |- abcd          |- 6.0          |   |- data dictionary dataframe          |- ...     |- hbcd          |- 1.0          |   |- data dictionary dataframe          |- ...

title: List of levels — lst_levels
text: list categorical levels tables NBDC Data Hub studies. First level list study name (currently ABCD & HBCD), second level version/release study.
code: - lst_levels     |- abcd          |- 6.0          |   |- levels dataframe          |- ...     |- hbcd          |- 1.0          |   |- levels dataframe          |- ...

title: List of sessions — lst_sessions
text: list session metadata NBDC Data Hub studies. First level list study name (currently ABCD & HBCD), second level version/release study.
code: - lst_sessions     |- abcd          |- 6.0          |   |- sessions dataframe          |- ...     |- hbcd          |- 1.0          |   |- sessions dataframe          |- ...
